column6:
Full size comfy bed
Lovely antique furniture
Flat screen TV in room
Dorm Fridge and Microwave in Room
Wifi available
Cable 
Continental breakfast everyday (excluding long-term / more than 7 days)
Hot meals available for fee
Laundry facilities available (schedule posted)
On bus line / Uber and Lyft available 
Street parking
Close to businesses in Frisco, Addison & Plano
MUST BE COMFORTABLE LIVING WITH DOGS
